description: Ubutabera ku mwana bugomba gushingira ku burenganzira bwe.
title: Ubutabera ku mwana bugomba gushingira ku burenganzira bwe.
content: Ubutabera ku mwana bugomba gushingira ku burenganzira bwe. Hagomba gufatwa ingamba zihamye zigamije gufasha umwana wese wagiriwe ihohoterwa iryo ariryo ryose. Mugihe bibaye ngombwa ko umwana avutswa uburenganzira bwe, nko gufungwa, bigomba kuba ari icyemezo cya nyuma y’ibindi.
